name: Xanthiom Zero
description:
Take control of Captain Grisham as you investigate the uncharted Planet 4-514. Collect items to help you progress deeper into the planet's depths, and power up your weapons to fight off powerful enemies and bosses! Explore multiple biomes, each with its own hazards to navigate, and uncover the mysteries that lie underneath the surface!

Features:

  • Over 70 items to discover
  • Each item has its own unique uses



  • Customize your weapons and find powerful combinations
  • Over 5000 weapons combinations


  • Battle against challenging bosses
  • Each one of the 10+ bosses presents a unique challenge


Earn Achievements to unlock modifiers which can be applied to new games, such as:
  • Limiting your maximum health
  • Making the entire world dark
  • An item randomizer
  • And much more!



  • Original Soundtrack.
  • Original Art.
  • Made entirely by 2 people.
